VIII.i.3.C.5.a
.
Specific Thailand Service Requirements
Effective January 1, 2020,
PL 116-23
, as codified at
38 U.S.C. 1822(c)
, provides benefits and services to children born with spina bifida who are the natural children of Veterans with covered service in Thailand.
Covered service in Thailand
requires
active military, naval, or air service in Thailand during the period beginning on January 9, 1962, and ending on May 7, 1975, and
exposure to an herbicide agent during such service as determined by VA in consultation with the DoD.
Reference
:Â  For more information on developing claims based on herbicide exposure in Thailand, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, 1.A.4
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Eligibility and Development
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
